    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character(int x,
                 int y,
                 processing.core.PImage sprite,
                 processing.core.PImage projectileSprite,
                 int row,
                 int column,
                 float cooldown)
        Constructor method for Character with one sprite
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate on window
        y - y-coordinate on window
        sprite - image of Character
        projectileSprite - image of projectile that Character shoots
        row - row number on window grid
        column - column number on window grid
        cooldown - cooldown time for shooting projectiles

      • Character

        public Character(int x,
                 int y,
                 java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> sprites,
                 processing.core.PImage projectileSprite,
                 int row,
                 int column,
                 float cooldown)
        Constructor method for Character with multiple sprites
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate on window
        y - y-coordinate on window
        sprites - images of Character
        projectileSprite - image of projectile that Character shoots
        row - row number on window grid
        column - column number on window grid
        cooldown - cooldown time for shooting projectiles

    • Method Detail

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(int row,
                              int column)
        Takes in the row and column numbers of another game object and checks if character collides with it
        Parameters:
        row - row number of other game object on window grid
        column - column number of other game object on window grid
        Returns:
        true if character collides with object, and false if it does not

      • move

        public void move()
        Moves Character depending on its direction attributes. Borders are added to prevent movement off screen. Snaps Character to next full tile.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stops the Character from moving by switching all the movement attributes to false

      • kill

        public void kill()
        Kills the Character

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        Draws the Character onto the window
        Parameters:
        app - PApplet app that Character should be drawn in
